snippet: A measure would authorize a tax on the shale gas industry in exchange for removing some barriers to development.
abstract: Pennsylvania passes legislation that would authorize a tax on the shale gas industry in exchange for removing some barriers to development; critics say bill will leave many municipalities with little control over the use of their land.
lead_paragraph: A measure would authorize a tax on the shale gas industry in exchange for removing some barriers to development.

headline.seo: Pennsylvania Senate Passes Bill on Marcellus Shale Gas Drilling
headline.main: Pennsylvania Set to Allow Local Taxes on Shale Gas
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania Set to Allow Local Taxes On Shale Gas
